Class MenuMarchand

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.MenuMarchand
public class MenuMarchand extends Object
Handles the interaction logic between the player (Hero) and the Merchant in a console-based interface. This class manages buying and selling items within a specific MerchantRoom.

  • Method Details

    • ouvrir

      public static void ouvrir(Heros heros, MerchantRoom shop, Scanner scanner)
      Opens the merchant interaction menu. This method starts the main loop for the shop interface, allowing the player to buy, sell, or leave.
      Parameters:
      heros - The hero interacting with the merchant.
      shop - The merchant room containing the stock of items.
      scanner - The scanner used to read user input.
